00001 #include "RootTreeGenerator3.hh"

00020     RootTreeGenerator3 aRootTreeGenerator3;
00021     
00022     map<TTree*, RootTreeGenerator3*> RootTreeGenerator3::_treeFillerMap;
00023     map<TTree*, RootTreeGenerator3*> RootTreeGenerator3::_treeOwnerMap;
00024     map<TFile*, RootTreeGenerator3*> RootTreeGenerator3::_fileOwnerMap;
00025     
00026     RootTreeGenerator3::RootTreeGenerator3() : Processor("RootTreeGenerator3")
00027     {
00028         _description = "Processor to generate root tree with Event built";
00029         
00030         registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName",
00031                                    "Name of the input collection of Labview raw data",
00032                                    _inputColName,
00033                                    std::string("LabviewData"));
00034         
00035         registerProcessorParameter("OutputRootFileName",
00036                                    "Name of the output root file",
00037                                    _rootFileName,
00038                                    std::string("LabviewDataCERN.root"));
00039         
00040         registerProcessorParameter("BranchPrefix",
00041                                    "Name of the prefix of the branch",
00042                                    _prefix,
00043                                    std::string("ahc"));
00044         
00045     }
00046     
00047     RootTreeGenerator3::~RootTreeGenerator3() {}
00048     
00049     void RootTreeGenerator3::init()
00050     {
00051         
00052         _rootFile = gROOT->GetFile(_rootFileName.c_str());
00053         if ( _rootFile == NULL )
00054         {
00055             _rootFile      = new TFile(_rootFileName.c_str(), "RECREATE");
00056             _fileOwnerMap[ _rootFile ] = this;
00057         }
00058         
00059         _rootFile->cd();
00060         _treeLabviewBlock = dynamic_cast<TTree*>( _rootFile->Get("LabviewData"));
00061         
00062         if ( _treeLabviewBlock != NULL )
00063             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Reuse tree ["<< "LabviewData" <<"] " << endl;
00064         if ( _treeLabviewBlock == NULL )
00065         {
00066             _treeLabviewBlock = new TTree( "LabviewData" , "all information");
00067             _treeOwnerMap[_treeLabviewBlock] = this;
00068         }
00069         
00070         bool firstProcessor = (_treeFillerMap[ _treeLabviewBlock ] == NULL );
00071         _treeFillerMap[ _treeLabviewBlock ] = this;
00072         
00073         if ( firstProcessor )
00074         {
00075             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( "eventNumber", &eventNumber, "EventNumber/I");
00076             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( "runNumber", &runNumber, "RunNumber/I");
00077             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( "Timestamp", &Timestamp, "Timestamp/I");
00078         }
00079         
00080         registerBranches(_treeLabviewBlock);
00081     }
00082     
00083     void RootTreeGenerator3::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00084     {
00085         
00086         hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "nHits").c_str(), &_hFill.nHits,  string(_prefix+"nHits/I").c_str());
00087         hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix+"iEvt").c_str(), &_hFill.iEvt, string(_prefix+"iEvt/I").c_str());
00088         
00089         hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "BunchXID").c_str(), &_hFill.BunchXID, string(_prefix+"BunchXID["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00090         hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "CycleNr").c_str(), &_hFill.CycleNr, string(_prefix+"CycleNr["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00091         hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "ChipID").c_str(), &_hFill.ChipID, string(_prefix+"ChipID["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00092         hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "EvtNr").c_str(), &_hFill.EvtNr, string(_prefix+"EvtNr["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00093         hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "Channel").c_str(), &_hFill.Channel, string(_prefix+"Channel["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00094         hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "TDC").c_str(), &_hFill.TDC, string(_prefix+"TDC["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00095         hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "ADC").c_str(), &_hFill.ADC, string(_prefix+"ADC["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00096         hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "HitBit").c_str(), &_hFill.HitBit, string(_prefix+"HitBit["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00097         hostTree->Branch( string(_prefix + "GainBit").c_str(), &_hFill.GainBit, string(_prefix+"GainBit["+_prefix+"nHits]/I").c_str() );
00098         
00099         ievt = 0;
00100         
00101     }
00102     
00103     void RootTreeGenerator3::FillVariable(LCEvent* evt)
00104     {
00105         
00106         LCCollection* col ;
00107         try
00108         {
00109             //fetch Labview data raw collection
00110             col = evt->getCollection( _inputColName ) ;
00111             
00112             //cout <<"\n Event "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<", loop over collection "<< _inputColName
00113             //       <<" with "<< col->getNumberOfElements()<<" elements "<<endl;
00114             
00115             nHits = 0;
00116             
00117             //check all the ChipID, each one has 36 channels,
00118             for(int ielm = 0; ielm < col->getNumberOfElements(); ielm++)
00119             {
00120                 LCObject *obj = col->getElementAt(ielm);
00121                 LabviewBlock2 lBlock(obj);
00122                 
00123                 _hFill.BunchXID[nHits] = lBlock.GetBunchXID();
00124                 _hFill.CycleNr[nHits] = lBlock.GetCycleNr();
00125                 _hFill.ChipID[nHits]  = lBlock.GetChipID();
00126                 _hFill.EvtNr[nHits]   = lBlock.GetEvtNr();
00127                 _hFill.Channel[nHits] = lBlock.GetChannel();
00128                 _hFill.TDC[nHits]     = lBlock.GetTDC();
00129                 _hFill.ADC[nHits]     = lBlock.GetADC();
00130                 _hFill.HitBit[nHits]  = lBlock.GetHitBit();
00131                 _hFill.GainBit[nHits] = lBlock.GetGainBit();
00132                     
00133                 nHits ++;
00134                 ievt ++;
00135             }
00136             
00137             _hFill.iEvt = ievt;
00138             _hFill.nHits = nHits;
00139         }
00140         catch (  DataNotAvailableException err )
00141         {
00142             //  cout <<  "RootTreeGenerator3 WARNING: Collection "<< _inputColName
00143             //       << " not available in event "<< evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00144             return;
00145         }
00146         
00147     }
00148     
00149     void RootTreeGenerator3::processEvent(LCEvent* evt)
00150     {
00151         
00152         runNumber   = evt->getRunNumber();
00153         eventNumber = evt->getEventNumber();
00154         Timestamp   = evt->getTimeStamp();
00155         
00156         FillVariable(evt);
00157         
00158         if ( _treeFillerMap[_treeLabviewBlock] == this )
00159         {
00160             TFile* oldfile = _treeLabviewBlock->GetCurrentFile();
00161             _treeLabviewBlock->Fill();
00162             TFile* newfile = _treeLabviewBlock->GetCurrentFile();
00163             if (oldfile!=newfile)
00164             {
00165                 RootTreeGenerator3* owner = _fileOwnerMap[oldfile];
00166                 _fileOwnerMap.erase( oldfile );
00167                 _fileOwnerMap[newfile]=owner;
00168             }
00169         }
00170         
00171     }
00172     
00173     void RootTreeGenerator3::end()
00174     {
00175         
00176         if ( _treeOwnerMap[_treeLabviewBlock] == this )
00177         {
00178             TFile* treeFile = _treeLabviewBlock->GetCurrentFile();      
00179             treeFile->Write();
00180             delete _treeLabviewBlock;
00181             _treeLabviewBlock=NULL;
00182         }
00183         
00184         if ( _fileOwnerMap[_rootFile] == this )
00185         {
00186             _rootFile->Write();
00187             _rootFile->Close();
00188             //delete _outFile;
00189             _rootFile=NULL;
00190         }
00191     }
00192     
00193     const double RootTreeGenerator3::INVALID = -FLT_MAX;
00194     
00195 }
